"Who cares?" Megatron answered as he flew on.=A0 "Let him stall, buy time.=
=A0 I'd rather he make themot of it beofre I slag him."
=A0
In he end it wo=
uldn't matter.=A0 he would rather destroy all oppostion while recoverg Rodi=
mus time, simply because it was simple.=A0 And he scarsely doubted anythin =
back coul happen now.=A0 He knewh could react rapidly to a sudden change an=
d easily overcome it.=A0 This infantile Transformers were pathetic, all the=
y could do was stall.=A0 Never turn him away.
